price: "Falalar Allah mai wanzuwa ita ce mafi alhẽri a gare ku idan kun kasance muminai, kuma ni bã mai tsaro ne a kanku ba."
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minīna wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
